head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EDLICH, DR. THEODORE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EDLICH, DR. THEODORE

block.p: EDLICH-Dr. Theodore, Jr. On October 13, 2000. Retired Internist at Saint Clares and Cabrini Hospitals. Devoted husband of DeDe and the late Virginia. Beloved father of Theodore III, Dr. Richard and the late Stephen. Dear grandfather and great-grandfather. Dear brother of Marguerite Volmer and uncle of Robert Volmer. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to: The Multiple Sclerosis Foundation or Diabetes Foundation. Friends may call at Andrett Funeral Home, 353 2nd Avenue (at 20 Street), New York City, Sunday 2-5 and 7-9 PM. Funeral services will be held at the funeral home Monday at 11:30 AM. Interment at Nassau Knolls Cemetery.
